rows.segment_description: The Intelligent Cloud segment includes public, private, and hybrid server products and cloud services that support modern business and developers. It primarily consists of server products and cloud services such as Azure, GitHub, Nuance Healthcare cloud services, and enterprise and partner services including Enterprise Support Services and Microsoft Partner Network. This segment focuses on cloud infrastructure, AI offerings, server software, and professional services to enhance productivity and efficiency for IT professionals and developers.

The More Personal Computing segment includes products and services that focus on personal technology experiences. It comprises Windows and Devices (including Windows OEM licensing and Surface devices), Gaming (Xbox hardware, content, subscriptions, and cloud gaming), and Search and news advertising (Bing, Copilot, Microsoft News, Microsoft Edge). This segment aims to deliver consistent user experiences across devices, expand gaming ecosystems, and provide relevant advertising solutions.

The Productivity and Business Processes segment offers productivity, communication, and information services across devices and platforms. It includes Microsoft 365 Commercial and Consumer products and cloud services, LinkedIn with its Talent, Marketing, Premium, and Sales Solutions, and Dynamics products and cloud services such as Dynamics 365 ERP and CRM applications. This segment focuses on AI-powered business productivity tools, professional networking, and intelligent business applications to empower organizations and individuals.
key_products_services: Microsoft 365 Commercial products and cloud services
Microsoft 365 Consumer products and cloud services
